item.list.bad_item.desc: §7§oTechnical items, please do not attempt to obtain
item.list.farmers_ranch_star.desc.1: §7§oA star crafted through countless hardships, it is light yet its mass remains unknown.
item.list.farmers_ranch_star.desc.2: §7§oThank you for playing the Farmer's Ranch: Pastoral Serenade modpack. The entire development team and contributors send you their regards.
item.list.just_bread.desc.1: It's just a piece of bread, an ordinary, unremarkable piece of bread;
item.list.just_bread.desc.2: Eat it, and you will no longer feel hungry;
item.list.just_bread.desc.3: But that familiar aroma of wheat has long since faded.
